sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect,useContext } from 'react' import { useHistory, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { CBadge, CCard, CCardBody, CCardHeader, CCol, CDataTable, CRow, CFormGroup, CInput, CLabel, CPagination, CButton } from '@coreui/react' import UserProvider from "../../context/UserContext" import usersData from '../../views/users/UsersData' const getBadge = status => { switch (status) { case 'Active': return 'success' case 'Inactive': return 'secondary' case 'Pending': return 'warning' case 'Banned': return 'danger' default: return 'primary' } } const DashboardAddUser = () => { const {fetchUsersApi,users,updateUser}=useContext(UserProvider.Context) useEffect(() => { // currentPage !== page && setPage(currentPage) }, []) return ( Add User Name updateUser('name',e.target.value)} /> Email updateUser('name',e.target.value)} required /> Add Users example {}} scopedSlots = {{ 'status': (item)=>( {item.status} ) }} /> ) } export default DashboardAddUser
